pageProps.content:
Experience

Kurland is an elegant country hotel set on a private polo estate between Knysna & Plettenberg Bay along the renowned Garden Route.
Family-owned & run, Kurland is all about exceptional service, beautiful suites, sublime local cuisine & family-friendly activities, including horse-riding & quad biking on the estate.
With an ideal location in the heart of the Garden Route, guests will be close to some of the area’s top attractions, including The Elephant Sanctuary, Birds of Eden, Monkeyland & the beautiful Nature’s Valley with its scenic forest trails.
Families will fall in love with Kurland since there is ample space for the little ones to run around & a variety of exciting activities to choose from. There is also a dedicated Kids Club area & a swimming pool. Kids meals can also be arranged & trained nannies are also available.
Children of all ages are welcome at Kurland.

Stay

Kurland has 12 tastefully decorated, spacious suites & can accommodate up to 48 people.
The luxury & superior suites all have private loft rooms that are specially furnished for children with their own en-suite bathrooms. The luxury suites have secluded courtyards & water features while the superior suites all have private pools, which enjoy magnificent views of the estate.
Communal areas include a polo pavilion complete with a restaurant, bar & children’s playroom. There is also a wellness spa that offers a range of relaxing treatments. The relaxing lounge, dining room with fireplace & outdoor patio area are ideal for relaxing & the swimming pool with sun loungers invite guests to relax after a day of exploration.

Activities

Kurland’s list of activities is endless. These include horse-riding, quad biking, mountain biking, tennis, spa treatments & deep-sea fishing.
Other exciting options include forest hikes, elephant-back rides, tree-canopy tours, birding, whale watching & much more.
Beach-lovers will enjoy spending time at one of Plettenberg Bay’s blue flag beaches.

subfolders.title: Christiana Lodge
subfolders.description: Christiana Lodge is a classic beach house situated only a 5-minute walk from the renowned Robberg Beach in the coastal town of Plettenberg Bay. This west-facing Garden Route lodge offers individually-styled rooms with private decks & sensational sunsets.

subfolders.title: Emily Moon River Lodge
subfolders.description: Surrounded by indigenous vegetation, with views of the surrounding wetland, winding river & distant mountains, Emily Moon River Lodge in Plettenberg Bay offers a true nature experience. The lodge overlooks the southern bank of the Bitou River & from its beautiful, contemporary rooms, guests can soak up sensational river views.

subfolders.title: Head Over Hills
subfolders.description: Perched on the edge of the iconic Knysna Heads, the five-star Head Over Hills Luxury Retreat boasts spectacular views of the surrounding ocean & mountains. This award-winning retreat has taken many prizes for its superb location, including the Prime Location Hotel in South Africa by the prestigious Haute Grandeur – indeed, a wonderful achievement.

subfolders.title: Hog Hollow Country Lodge
subfolders.description: Hog Hollow Country Lodge is situated in a private nature reserve near Plettenberg Bay - one of the Garden Route’s most beautiful beachside towns.   The estate boasts magnificent views of the surrounding valleys & Tsitsikamma Mountains, & is situated alongside a central dam, creating a private oasis on the edge of an indigenous forest.

subfolders.title: Hunters Country House
subfolders.description: Hunters Country House is an original thatched homestead, set among beautiful gardens, against the backdrop of the majestic Tsitsikamma Mountains in the heart of the Garden Route.   This peaceful & tranquil retreat is the ideal place from which to explore the Garden Route as it is a short drive from Plettenberg Bay & the popular town of Knysna.

subfolders.title: Kanonkop House
subfolders.description: The luxurious Kanonkop House is perched on a hill above the beautiful Garden Route town of Knysna & offers captivating views of the lagoon & the iconic Knysna Heads. This well-appointed guesthouse is located near the centre of town & is, therefore, an ideal base from which to explore Knysna & the surrounding area of the Garden Route.

subfolders.title: Knysna Hollow Country Estate
subfolders.description: Set in a tranquil country estate near Knysna Lagoon, the elegant Knysna Hollow Country Estate offers a relaxed space just minutes from the centre of this pretty seaside town. The estate offers sensational views of the famous Knysna Heads, 2 large rocky headlands that stick out over the channel between the Indian Ocean & the Knysna Estuary.

subfolders.title: Kurland
subfolders.description: Kurland is an elegant country hotel set on a private polo estate between Knysna & Plettenberg Bay along the renowned Garden Route. Family-owned & run, Kurland is all about exceptional service, beautiful suites, sublime local cuisine & family-friendly activities, including horse-riding & quad biking on the estate.

subfolders.title: Leisure Isle Lodge
subfolders.description: Situated on a tiny island in Knysna Lagoon, right at the heart of the Garden Route, you will find Leisure Isle Lodge – a charming guesthouse that sits alongside cosy beach cottages. Offering beautiful views of the Knysna Lagoon, the elegant restaurant & outdoor pool area is a wonderful place to relax in the sun after a day of exploration.

subfolders.title: No 5 Boutique Art Hotel
subfolders.description: Nr 5 Boutique Art Hotel is set within an upscale neighbourhood in Port Elizabeth, an easy stroll from Summerstrand – one of the best beaches in the area.   Small & intimate, this boutique hotel offers friendly & personalized service & a variety of modern facilities such as a wellness spa, a fitness centre & a restaurant serving fine cuisine.

subfolders.title: Pezula Resort Hotel & Spa
subfolders.description: Pezula Resort Hotel & Spa is an award-winning golf resort with a dramatic location set on a cliff overlooking the beautiful Knysna lagoon to the north & the Outeniqua Mountains in the distance. The resort is home to an 18-hole Pezula Championship Golf Course & offers a range of other family-friendly activities like horse-riding, tennis, cycling, mountain biking while yachting, kayaking, diving & fishing can also be arranged.

subfolders.title: Radisson Blu Hotel Port Elizabeth
subfolders.description: The Radisson Blu Hotel Port Elizabeth is situated only 300 meters from the blue flag beaches of Algoa Bay – widely regarded as boasting some of the best beaches in the country & a paradise for watersport enthusiasts. Port Elizabeth is more than just their beaches.  The seaside town is home to a variety of good restaurants, museums & monuments as well as a wonderful overnight destination after a Garden Route holiday or en-route to Addo Elephant Park.

subfolders.title: Tamodi Lodge & Stables
subfolders.description: Tamodi Lodge enjoys an idyllic setting on a working equestrian farm within a private nature reserve just outside the sought-after seaside town of Plettenberg Bay. Here, guests will enjoy jaw-dropping views of the surrounding mountains in a serene setting.

subfolders.title: The Plettenberg
subfolders.description: Perched high on a rocky headland, overlooking the golden Formosa Beach in Plettenberg Bay, the sophisticated & intimate beach hotel promises captivating & uninterrupted views of the ocean below. The Plettenberg is perfectly situated to some of the area’s best beaches, including the ever-popular Central Beach as well as blue flag Robberg Beach.  Excellent whale watching can be experienced here between August to December each year.

subfolders.title: The Rex Hotel
subfolders.description: Situated in Knysna’s trendy Grey Street – a thoroughfare lined with cafes, restaurants & boutiques, you will find The Rex Hotel. Just around the corner, the Knysna Waterfront invites guests to browse, shop or dine to their hearts’ content & return to their quiet slice of paradise tucked away in a remote corner of this seaside town.

subfolders.title: The Turbine Boutique Hotel
subfolders.description: Located on Thesen Island in Knysna Lagoon, The Turbine Boutique Hotel is unique in every way.  This converted power station is now an upscale boutique hotel with a unique look & feel.   All the original machinery has been integrated into the design of the hotel to remind guests of its glorious past.

subfolders.title: The Windermere
subfolders.description: Set in the upscale suburb of Humewood, close to the prestigious Humewood Golf Club & Port Elizabeth Airport, you will find The Windermere – a contemporary boutique hotel with direct access to King’s Beach. The boutique hotel is within walking distance to the endless blue flag beaches & independent eateries, & The Boardwalk can also be found nearby.

subfolders.title: Tsala Treetop Lodge
subfolders.description: Tsala Treetop Lodge, as the name suggests, is located within a magnificent forest along South Africa’s ever-popular Garden Route.   The Tsitsikamma Forest boasts beautiful nature walks & is a short drive away from Plettenberg Bay, where you can enjoy white, sandy beaches & outstanding restaurants.

whatWeLoveItems: Elegant country hotel on a private polo estate
Centrally located between Knysna & Plettenberg Bay
